title: service
description: This is service object from the hsda-search service.

id.description: Each service must have a unique identifier.

organization_id.description: The identifier of the organization that provides this service.

program_id.description: The identifier of the program this service is delivered under.

location_id.description: The identifier of the location where this service is delivered.

name.description: The official or public name of the service.

alternate_name.description: Alternative or commonly used name for a service.

status.description: The current status of the service.

interpretation_services.description: A description of any interpretation services available for accessing this service.

application_process.description: The steps needed to access the service.

wait_time.description: Time a client may expect to wait before receiving a service.

accreditations.description: Details of any accreditations. Accreditation is the formal evaluation of an organization or program against best practice standards set by an accrediting organization.

licenses.description: An organization may have a license issued by a government entity to operate legally. A list of any such licenses can be provided here.

id.description: Each contact must have a unique identifier.

organization_id.description: The identifier of the organization for which this is a contact.

service_id.description: The identifier of the service for which this is a contact.

service_at_location_id.description: The identifier of the u2018service at locationu2019 table entry, when this contact is specific to a service in a particular location.

title.description: The job title of the person.

department.description: The department that the person is part of.

email.description: The email address of the person.

id.description: Each entry must have a unique identifier.

service_id.description: The identifier of the service for which this entry describes the eligibility criteria.

eligibility.description: The rules or guidelines that determine who can receive the service.

id.description: Each entry must have a unique identifier.

service_id.description: The identifier of the service for which this entry describes the costs of service.

fee.description: A listing of the costs of services, including free ones.

id.description: Each entry must have a unique identifier.

organization_id.description: The identifier of the organization for which this entry describes the source of funding.

service_id.description: The identifier of the service for which this entry describes the source of funding.

source.description: Source of funds for organization or service.

id.description: Each entry must have a unique identifier.

service_id.description: The identifier of the service for which this is the regular schedule.

location_id.description: The identifier of the location for which this is the regular schedule.

service_at_location_id.description: The identifier of the u2018service at locationu2019 table entry, when this schedule is specific to a service in a particular location.

weekday.description: The day of the week that this entry relates to.

opens_at.description: The time when a service or location opens. This should use HH:MM format and should include timezone information, either adding the suffix u2018Zu2019 when the date is in UTC, or including an offset from UTC (e.g. 09:00-05:00 for 9am East Coast Time.

closes_at.description: The time when a service or location opens. This should use HH:MM format and should include timezone information, either adding the suffix u2018Zu2019 when the date is in UTC, or including an offset from UTC (e.g. 09:00-05:00 for 9am East Coast Time.

id.description: Each entry must have a unique identifier.

service_id.description: The identifier of the service for which this is the holiday schedule.

location_id.description: The identifier of the location for which this is the holiday schedule.

service_at_location_id.description: The identifier of the u2018service at locationu2019 table entry, when this schedule is specific to a service in a particular location.

closed.description: Indicates if a service or location is closed during a public holiday.

opens_at.description: The time when a service or location opens. This should use HH:MM format and should include timezone information, either adding the suffix u2018Zu2019 when the date is in UTC, or including an offset from UTC (e.g. 09:00-05:00 for 9am East Coast Time.

closes_at.description: The time when a service or location closes. This should use HH:MM format and should include timezone information, either adding the suffix u2018Zu2019 when the date is in UTC, or including an offset from UTC (e.g. 09:00-05:00 for 9am East Coast Time.

start_date.description: The first day that a service or location is closed during a public or private holiday.

end_date.description: The last day that a service or location is closed during a public or private holiday.

id.description: Each language must have a unique identifier.

service_id.description: The identifier of the service for which the entry describes the languages in which services are delivered.

location_id.description: The identifier of the location for which the entry describes the languages in which services are delivered.

language.description: Languages, other than English, in which the service is delivered. Languages are listed as ISO639-1 codes..

id.description: Each entry must have a unique identifier.

service_id.description: The identifier of the services for which the entry describes the accepted payment methods.

payment.description: The methods of payment accepted for the service.

id.description: Each entry must have a unique identifier.

location_id.description: The identifier of the location where this phone number is located.

service_id.description: The identifier of the service for which this is the phone number.

organization_id.description: The identifier of the organisation for which this is the phone number.

contact_id.description: The identifier of the contact for which this is the phone number.

service_at_location_id.description: The identifier of the u2018service at locationu2019 table entry, when this phone number is specific to a service in a particular location.

extension.description: The extension of the phone number.

type.description: Whether the phone number relates to a fixed or cellular phone.

department.description: The department for which this is the phone number.

language.description: A comma separated list of ISO 639-1, or ISO 639-2 [language codes](available at http://www.loc.gov/standards/iso639-2/php/code_list.php) to represent the languages available from this phone service. The three-letter codes from ISO 639-2 provide greater accuracy when describing variants of languages, which may be relevant to particular communities.

description.description: A description providing extra information about the phone service (e.g. any special arrangements for accessing, or details of availability at particular times.

id.description: Each document must have a unique identifier.

service_id.description: The identifier of the service for which this entry describes the required document.

document.description: The document required to apply for or receive the service. e.g. Government-issued ID, EU Passport.

id.description: Each service area must have a unique identifier.

service_id.description: The identifier of the service for which this entry describes the service area.

service_area.description: The geographic area where a service is available. This is a free-text description, and so may be precise or indefinite as necessary.

description.description: A more detailed description of this service area. Used to provide any additional information that cannot be communicated using the structured area and geometry fields.
